relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: 用于gentoo portage加速编译 配置make.conf # /etc/portage/make.conf # 为portage开启编译缓存器 FEATURES="ccache" CCACHE_DIR="/var/cache/ccache" # May be needed to workaround a bug, but has some security implications # https://bugs.gentoo.org/492910 #CCACHE_UMASK="0002" 配置ccache.conf # /var/cache/ccache/ccache.conf # Maximum cache size to maintain max_size = 100.0G # Allow others to run 'ebuild' and share the cache. umask = 002 # Don't include the current directory when calculating # hashes for the cache. This all.....

备份以快速恢复 1. 内核配置文件: /usr/src/linux/.config ## 方便重新配置内核 2. 文件安装配置: /etc/portage/make.conf以及 /etc/portage/package.* ## 方便配置USE flag 3. 已安装文件列表: /var/lib/portage/world ##方便emerge -avuDN world 4. X的配置文件: /etc/X11/xorg.conf ##方便配置鼠标，显示器 5. 磁盘挂载配置文件: /etc/fstab ##挂载 6. grub启动配置文件: /boot/grub/grub.cfg ##分区启动 7. ~/bashrc, ~/.xinitrc .... 8.二进制包;/var/cache/binpkgs/ #XAPK Or GAPK 9.源文件: /var/cache/distfiles/
